Welcome to jo’s documentation!¶

Contents:

class db_utilities.ConnectToCardsTable(database)[source]¶

Class to handle operations in the table that holds cards.

We hardcode the table’s name and we henceforth call it cards. Because of this the class instance is created without a “cards” variable.

class db_utilities.ConnectToDatabase(database)[source]¶

Connect to our store database.

We work with one database and therein we have all our tables with our stock :)

db_utilities.insert_row(self)[source]¶

Python’s security precautions to hardcode the table name here. (We call it cards)
